Modernization and Quality Improvement of Health Services Networks in Belo Horizonte - BetterHealth-BH
Modernização e Melhoria da Qualidade das Redes de Atenção em Saúde em Belo Horizonte - MelhorSaúde-BH
N/A

description.narrative: El programa tiene como objetivo mejorar el estado de salud de la población de Belo Horizonte mediante el aumento del acceso, calidad y eficiencia de los servicios de salud.
The program objective is to contribute to the health of the population by increasing access to health services, as well as their quality and efficiency, in the Município of Belo Horizonte

Interest repayment in first quarter of 2021
